Uses of Interface
com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters.TokenSequenceFilter

  • Packages that use TokenSequenceFilter 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.en
    Classes used to interact with existing resources in English, in particular the Penn Dependency Treebank.
    com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.standoff
    A package for converting to and from CoNLL-X to standoff format, for interaction with annoation tools requiring this format.
    com.joliciel.talismane.fr
    Package for interaction with existing resources in French (such as the SPMRL French corpus), facilitating training and evaluation with these resources.
    com.joliciel.talismane.fr.tokeniser.filters
    Filters specifically designed for French.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing (Parser), evaluation (ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the (PosTagger).
    It tags based on a previously constructed classificaton model, converting the model's outcomes to PosTag using the currently set PosTagSet.
    The PosTagSet is set via TalismaneSession.setPosTagSet(PosTagSet).
    The pos-tagger prodces a PosTagSequence which is a list of PosTaggedToken.
    It can be evaluated via a PosTaggerEvaluator.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters
    Token filters, which indicate portions of text to be tokenised as a single block, regardless of the statistical model (if it exists).

    • Uses of TokenSequenceFilter in com.joliciel.talismane.fr.tokeniser.filters

      Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.fr.tokeniser.filters that implement TokenSequenceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AllUppercaseFrenchFilter
      Looks for words in all upper-case, and transforms them into lower-case.
      class  EmptyTokenAfterDuFilter
      Always insert an empty token after "du", "des", "au" or "aux".
      class  EmptyTokenBeforeDuquelFilter
      Always insert an empty token before "auquel", "duquel", "auxquels", "desquels", "auxquelles", "desquelles".
      class  LowercaseFirstWordFrenchFilter
      Transforms a word into lower-case if it is a known word in the lexicon, and if it is at the start of a sentence or just following a quote.
      class  UpperCaseSeriesFrenchFilter
      Looks for a series of 2+ words in all upper-case, and transforms them into lower-case.

      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser with parameters of type TokenSequenceFilter

      void TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader.addTokenSequenceFilter(TokenSequenceFilter tokenSequenceFilter)
      These filters will be applied to each token sequence returned by the corpus prior to being returned.
      void Tokeniser.addTokenSequenceFilter(TokenSequenceFilter tokenSequenceFilter)

    • Uses of TokenSequenceFilter in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters

      Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters that implement TokenSequenceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DiacriticRemover
      Removes all diacritics from text.
      class  LowercaseFilter
      Puts text in lower case.
      class  LowercaseKnownFirstWordFilter
      Transforms a word into lower-case if it is a known word in the lexicon, and if it is at the start of a sentence or just following a quote.
      class  LowercaseKnownWordFilter
      Transforms a word with at least an initial uppercase letter into lower-case as long as it is a known word in the lexicon.
      class  QuoteNormaliser
      Normalises all unicode characters representing some sort of double quote to simple double quote, some sort of single quote to a simple apostrophe, and some sort of dash or hyphen to a simple minus sign.
      class  UppercaseSeriesFilter
      Looks for a series of 2+ words in all upper-case, and transforms them into lower-case.
      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters that return TokenSequenceFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TokenSequenceFilter TokenFilterService.getTokenSequenceFilter(List<TokenFilter> tokenFilters)
      Get a TokenSequenceFilter that wraps a list of token filters.
      TokenSequenceFilter TokenFilterService.getTokenSequenceFilter(String descriptor)
      Gets a TokenSequenceFilter corresponding to a given descriptor.
